channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 01:38 Dumping anxiety in the Chernihiv region.Creat by further messages.
item.description: 🟢 01:38 Dumping anxiety in the Chernihiv region.Creat by further messages.#Chernihiv This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
